trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.EventDescriptorCollection"></xref> class with the given array of <xref href="System.ComponentModel.EventDescriptor"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.ComponentModel.EventDescriptorCollection"> </xref> classe com a matriz de determinado <xref href="System.ComponentModel.EventDescriptor"> </xref> objetos.

trans-unit.source: If the `events` parameter is empty, this constructor creates an empty <xref:System.ComponentModel.EventDescriptorCollection> class.
trans-unit.target: Se o `events` parâmetro está vazio, este construtor cria um vazio <xref:System.ComponentModel.EventDescriptorCollection>classe.</xref:System.ComponentModel.EventDescriptorCollection>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Security.Permissions.HostProtectionAttribute> attribute applied to this member has the following <xref:System.Security.Permissions.HostProtectionAttribute.Resources%2A> property value: <xref:System.Security.Permissions.HostProtectionResource>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Security.Permissions.HostProtectionAttribute>atributo aplicado a este membro tem o seguinte <xref:System.Security.Permissions.HostProtectionAttribute.Resources%2A>valor da propriedade: <xref:System.Security.Permissions.HostProtectionResource>.</xref:System.Security.Permissions.HostProtectionResource> </xref:System.Security.Permissions.HostProtectionAttribute.Resources%2A> </xref:System.Security.Permissions.HostProtectionAttribute>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Security.Permissions.HostProtectionAttribute> does not affect desktop applications (which are typically started by double-clicking an icon, typing a command, or entering a URL in a browser).
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Security.Permissions.HostProtectionAttribute>não afeta as aplicações de ambiente de trabalho (que normalmente são iniciadas por um ícone de fazendo duplo clique, escrevendo um comando ou introduzir um URL num browser).</xref:System.Security.Permissions.HostProtectionAttribute>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the <xref:System.Security.Permissions.HostProtectionAttribute> class or [SQL Server Programming and Host Protection Attributes](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte o <xref:System.Security.Permissions.HostProtectionAttribute>classe ou [programação do SQL Server e os atributos de proteção do anfitrião](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).</xref:System.Security.Permissions.HostProtectionAttribute>

trans-unit.source: An array of type <xref href="System.ComponentModel.EventDescriptor"></xref> that provides the events for this collection.
trans-unit.target: Uma matriz do tipo <xref href="System.ComponentModel.EventDescriptor"> </xref> os eventos que fornece para esta coleção.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.EventDescriptorCollection"></xref> class with the given array of <xref href="System.ComponentModel.EventDescriptor"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.ComponentModel.EventDescriptorCollection"> </xref> classe com a matriz de determinado <xref href="System.ComponentModel.EventDescriptor"> </xref> objetos.
A coleção é opcionalmente só de leitura.

trans-unit.source: If the `events` parameter is empty, this constructor creates an empty <xref:System.ComponentModel.EventDescriptorCollection> class.
trans-unit.target: Se o `events` parâmetro está vazio, este construtor cria um vazio <xref:System.ComponentModel.EventDescriptorCollection>classe.</xref:System.ComponentModel.EventDescriptorCollection>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The <xref:System.Security.Permissions.HostProtectionAttribute> attribute applied to this class has the following <xref:System.Security.Permissions.HostProtectionAttribute.Resources%2A> property value: <xref:System.Security.Permissions.HostProtectionResource>.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > O <xref:System.Security.Permissions.HostProtectionAttribute>atributo aplicado para esta classe tem o seguinte <xref:System.Security.Permissions.HostProtectionAttribute.Resources%2A>valor da propriedade: <xref:System.Security.Permissions.HostProtectionResource>.</xref:System.Security.Permissions.HostProtectionResource> </xref:System.Security.Permissions.HostProtectionAttribute.Resources%2A> </xref:System.Security.Permissions.HostProtectionAttribute>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Security.Permissions.HostProtectionAttribute> does not affect desktop applications (which are typically started by double-clicking an icon, typing a command, or entering a URL in a browser).
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Security.Permissions.HostProtectionAttribute>não afeta as aplicações de ambiente de trabalho (que normalmente são iniciadas por um ícone de fazendo duplo clique, escrevendo um comando ou introduzir um URL num browser).</xref:System.Security.Permissions.HostProtectionAttribute>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the <xref:System.Security.Permissions.HostProtectionAttribute> class or [SQL Server Programming and Host Protection Attributes](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte o <xref:System.Security.Permissions.HostProtectionAttribute>classe ou [programação do SQL Server e os atributos de proteção do anfitrião](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).</xref:System.Security.Permissions.HostProtectionAttribute>

trans-unit.source: An array of type <xref href="System.ComponentModel.EventDescriptor"></xref> that provides the events for this collection.
trans-unit.target: Uma matriz do tipo <xref href="System.ComponentModel.EventDescriptor"> </xref> os eventos que fornece para esta coleção.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to specify a read-only collection; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Para especificar uma coleção só de leitura; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Adds an <xref href="System.ComponentModel.EventDescriptor"></xref> to the end of the collection.
trans-unit.target: Adiciona um <xref href="System.ComponentModel.EventDescriptor"> </xref> ao fim da colecção.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The <xref:System.Security.Permissions.HostProtectionAttribute> attribute applied to this class has the following <xref:System.Security.Permissions.HostProtectionAttribute.Resources%2A> property value: <xref:System.Security.Permissions.HostProtectionResource>.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE]> O <xref:System.Security.Permissions.HostProtectionAttribute>atributo aplicado para esta classe tem o seguinte <xref:System.Security.Permissions.HostProtectionAttribute.Resources%2A>valor da propriedade: <xref:System.Security.Permissions.HostProtectionResource>.</xref:System.Security.Permissions.HostProtectionResource> </xref:System.Security.Permissions.HostProtectionAttribute.Resources%2A> </xref:System.Security.Permissions.HostProtectionAttribute>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Security.Permissions.HostProtectionAttribute> does not affect desktop applications (which are typically started by double-clicking an icon, typing a command, or entering a URL in a browser).
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Security.Permissions.HostProtectionAttribute>não afeta as aplicações de ambiente de trabalho (que normalmente são iniciadas por um ícone de fazendo duplo clique, escrevendo um comando ou introduzir um URL num browser).</xref:System.Security.Permissions.HostProtectionAttribute>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the <xref:System.Security.Permissions.HostProtectionAttribute> class or [SQL Server Programming and Host Protection Attributes](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte o <xref:System.Security.Permissions.HostProtectionAttribute>classe ou [programação do SQL Server e os atributos de proteção do anfitrião](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).</xref:System.Security.Permissions.HostProtectionAttribute>
